error_auth.title: Authentication Required
error_auth.content: You must be authenticated as an IPS administrator to initialize a unit.

fields.markdown: Initialize and assign this QR to a unit by providing the following information:
Please take a photo of the unit's **gen set tag** (make it as clear as possible)
Please take a photo of the unit's **engine serial no. tag** (make it as clear as possible)
Please take a photo of the unit's **battery** (make it as clear as possible)

MAIN.title: Unit Info Sent
MAIN.body_md: Thank you! We've received your submission and will complete setup for this QR typically within a day. If you'd like to resubmit you can do so now; otherwise the QR will be active shortly for tracking service history and recording updates.
